Description: 2006 Fender American Stratocaster Shoreline Gold El. Guitar w/Case #Z6113667 2006 Fender American Stratocaster Shoreline Gold El. Guitar w/Case #Z6113667 Up for sale a 2006-2007 Fender American Stratocaster Shoreline Gold Electric Guitar w/Case - #Z6113667! This instrument is a Used Model in Excellent Cosmetic Condition and in Perfect Playing Condition. One this one, there are some scratches, marks, tiny dents, barely few tiny notches, tiny finish cracks (lower side body) and few other signs of wear here and there (see 15th to 25th pictures), but really nothing major. Also, the standard molded case doesn't close perfectly on the lower side (see 25th picture). Unit comes with its Original 3-Ply Parchment Pickguard, a Tremolo Arm, its Papers and Wrenches in its Fender Standard Molded Case. - All pictures are in the "Item Description" section of the listing - MODIFICATIONS : The original 3-Ply Parchment Pickguard has been changed for a 3-Ply Tortoise Stratocaster Pickguard (see 1st and 11th pictures), one of the Control Knobs (center) has been replaced (see 1st and 8th pictures) and the Tremolo Arm is not the original. 2006-2007 FENDER AMERICAN STRATOCASTER The beauty of the American Stratocaster guitar is in its details. This model incorporates several simple player-friendly refinements into the timeless design of the Strat guitar: hand-rolled fingerboard edges, three staggered single-coil pickups, five-way switching and two-point synchronized tremolo. FEATURES: - “Parchment” Knobs and Pickup Covers - Original Headstock Shape - Original Body Shape with “Original Contour Body” - Decal on Headstock - Rolled Fingerboard Edges - H/S/H Pickup Routing SPECIFICATIONS: Model Name : American Stratocaster Model Number : 011-7402-744 Series : American Series Color : Shoreline Gold (Polyurethane Finish) Body : Alder Neck : Maple, Modern “C” Shape, (Satin Polyurethane Finish) Fingerboard : Maple, 9.5” Radius (241mm) No. of Frets : 22 Medium Jumbo Frets Pickups : 3 American Stratocaster Single-Coil Pickups Controls : Master Volume, Tone 1. (Neck Pickup), Tone 2. New Delta Tone (“Delta Tone” system includes high output bridge pickup and special No-Load tone control for Middle and Bridge Pickups) Pickup Switching : 5-Position Blade: - Position 1. Bridge Pickup - Position 2. Bridge and Middle Pickup - Position 3. Middle Pickup - Position 4. Middle and Neck Pickup - Position 5. Neck Pickup Bridge : American 2-Point Synchronized Tremolo with Stainless Steel Saddles Machine Heads : Fender/Schaller Deluxe Staggered Cast/Sealed Tuning Machines Hardware : Chrome Pickguard : 3-Ply Tortoise (original 3-Ply Parchment pickguard included)) Scale Length : 25.5” (648 mm) Width at Nut : 1.6875” (43 mm) Accessories : Standard Molded Case Weight : 8.0 lbs / 3.7 kg All our items are fully verified by our pro technician and/or adjusted by our pro luthier before being very carefully packed by our pro service team here at the shop prior to shipment, buy with confidence! --------------------------------------------------------------------- Canadian customers must pay any applicable sales taxes. Please refer to the shipping and payments details for prices. **Depending on where you are located in Canada, free shipping may not apply to certain heavy or oversize orders. You can contact us for confirmation before buying. Shipping cost to USA includes lower 48 states only. For any other locations, please send us an email for a quote! We Ship Worldwide!!! To international buyers (outside Canada): Import duties, taxes, and charges are not included in the item price or shipping cost. These charges are the buyer's responsibility.
